title: Tutorial on Plagiarism Prevention and Ethical Research Practices for Science Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of academic research methods and basic citation practices
context.additional_context: Prospective teachers aim to prevent potential plagiarism cases during science curriculum research and lesson design. They engage in scenario-based learning through interactive modules in the LMS, focusing on real-world research paper writing

learning_goals: Learners can explain the definition of plagiarism and ethical research practices in scientific fields
Learners can accurately cite scientific data and format references according to APA/MLA style guidelines
Learners can evaluate their research drafts using plagiarism detection tools with over 85% accuracy in an interactive tutorial.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
